entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
